## My Statistical Analysis for My Statistics

### 1. Data Preparation

```{r}
#filePath <- file.choose()
filePath <- "/Users/apple/Desktop/YuqingRWork/Poker/DesciplinePokerAtheletes.xlsx"
GoogleSheet <- read_excel(filePath)

Testimate <- GoogleSheet %>% mutate(Date = ymd(Date), #sesStart = ymd_hms(sesStart), sesEnd = ymd_hms(sesEnd),
                             sesLength = as.numeric(sesEnd - sesStart), #directly make substraction between times
                             Profit = cashOut - buyIn, 
                             profitPerHr = Profit/sesLength,
                             totalProfit = promoBonus + Profit,
                             totalProfitPerHr = totalProfit/sesLength, 
                             accuHour = cumsum(sesLength),
                             accuProfit = cumsum(Profit), 
                             accuProfitPerHr = accuProfit/accuHour,
                             accuTotalProfit = cumsum(totalProfit),
                             accuTotalProfitPerHr = accuTotalProfit/accuHour); 

#options(tibble.width = Inf)  
#Testimate

```

### 2. Apply `htmlwidget` -> `highchater`, inspired by [Philipp Spachtholz](https://www.kaggle.com/philippsp/interactive-dashboards-in-r)

#### Beginner `highcharter` learning material by [Danton Noriega](https://dantonnoriega.github.io/ultinomics.org/post/2017-04-05-highcharter-explainer.html) and [Nana Boateng](https://rstudio-pubs-static.s3.amazonaws.com/304105_70f2ad540827454e934117e3d90f6c1a.html)


```{r}
#library(highcharter)
series = list(
  list(
    name = 'Total Profit for One Session',
    color = '#1E90FF', # <http://cloford.com/resources/colours/500col.htm>
    data = Testimate %>% select(totalProfit) %>% .[[1]]
  )
)

highchart() %>%
  hc_add_series_list(series) %>% hc_xAxis(categories = Testimate %>% select(Date) %>% .[[1]])
```

```{r}
series = list(
  list(
    name = 'Accumulate Total Profit (Counting Promo Bonus)',
    color = '#FFD700', 
    data = Testimate %>% select(accuTotalProfit) %>% .[[1]]
  )
)

highchart() %>%
  hc_add_series_list(series) %>% hc_xAxis(categories = Testimate %>% select(Date) %>% .[[1]])
```


```{r}
series = list(
  list(
    name = 'Accumulate Profit Per Hour',
    color = '#EEAD0E',
    data = Testimate %>% select(accuProfitPerHr) %>% .[[1]] %>% round(2) 
  ),
  list(
    name = 'Accumulate Total Profit Per Hour (Counting Promo Bonus)',
    color = '#FF7D40',
    data = Testimate %>% select(accuTotalProfitPerHr) %>% .[[1]] %>% round(2)
  )
)

highchart() %>%
  hc_add_series_list(series) %>% hc_xAxis(categories = Testimate %>% select(Date) %>% .[[1]])
```




'highcharter' seems to be outdated on CRAN. Directly install from github:

```
library(devtools)
install_github("jbkunst/highcharter")
```
